name: Mech a choice
description:
An entry for the Godot Wild Jam III what missed the deadline by 10 min, well, better luck next time i guess.

Incomplete, But you can play whats of it, the idea was run around the city trying to strategically destroy parts as each one gives you bonuses... well if it were complete.

  • M: to open map
  • P: for Pause
  • F: to pay respect

you can get the source here:

https://github.com/SirRichard94/Mech-a-choice
